remarks: A complex constant times a measurable function is measurable. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 17-Aug-2014.)
statement:
mbfmulc2.1 $e |- ( ph -> C e. CC ) $.
mbfmulc2.2 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. A ) -> B e. V ) $.
mbfmulc2.3 $e |- ( ph -> ( x e. A |-> B ) e. MblFn ) $.
mbfmulc2 $p |- ( ph -> ( x e. A |-> ( C x. B ) ) e. MblFn ) $.
$d A x $.
$d C x $.
$d ph x $.
